alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Copiah; Hinds; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 9:55AM CDT until June 15 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN TENSAS AND SOUTHEASTERN MADISON PARISHES... SOUTHWESTERN WARREN...CLAIBORNE...SOUTHWESTERN HINDS AND WESTERN COPIAH COUNTIES... At 955 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Newellton, or 11 miles north of St. Joseph, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Port Gibson around 1015 AM CDT. Hermanville and Pattison around 1025 AM CDT. Peyton around 1035 AM CDT. Barlow and Dentville around 1045 AM CDT. Glancy around 1055 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
